column5: Well it's been pretty crazy for me the last month with Holidays and such and work as well. In terms of Muskie I have gone 10 for 15 in the last three weeks. I know some people are going to question this and probably not believe me but I have no reason to Bull**** this. I found a honey hole on a lake where my new trailer is. A few nights I went 2 for 3 one night I even went 2for5 I'm telling you it has been just nuts. Almost to the point where I say oh! theres another and my wife laughs. We went out this weekend and the fun had stopped due to the barometer I think. I am just starting to work with this tool as well. Anyways I have posted some of the fish I have caught. Some of the pics aren't the best as I basically try not to hold the fish out of the water for longer then 10 seconds before being released as I don't keep anything. Remember if you are going to target these fish be prepared and use the proper tackle and releasing equipment.         Anyways Cheers and rip those lures.
wow nice miskie's. Thanks for sharing!
Excellent Muskie wow 2 reports from you now where did you put that trailer
Awww Mike I'm not sure if I remember hehehe. If you send me a PM I can set you up
Awesome sharks gnoddy... way to go The pics a wonderful  Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice fish and report. I recognize that bridge in the back of your first pic, but I will keep your secret
Nice fish!!!  I'll bet the stories your son will tell at school about dad being a pro,,,super hero fisherman will be better!!!  fishing partners for life  Way to go...great report.  M.
Pretty sure I know the area! You're right it is some of the easiest musky fishing ever for numbers but not a whole lotta big girls.  Nice work and thanks for the report!
That must be one heck of a honey hole Gnoddy.   Congrats.
Thanks Guys if you know where this is then keep it to yourself. That way it won't get overrun.
nice report and fish...you gotta love when you can fish out your back door and get consistent results..

Many have said it already but just the same...  Exellent fishing GNODDY.... I hope you manage to contain your whereabouts well.... its always a downright shame when a great area gets swamped with too many wannabee musky anglers whom do not carry all the proper release equipment or even the right rodNreel. .....let alone the added fishing pressure. Congrats on your luck of a decent fishery where you trailer.
Yeah that sound like a good spot   , thanks for the report...
Congrats!! Some really nice ski's. Even nicer when you get to share the experience with your son in the boat. Thanks for the report!  Cheers, 1leg
Doh...posting the pic with the landmark in the background!!! Still, this is something you and your son will always remember.
some very nice fish, thanks for sharing!
